sentences.en: Babies have gristle in some parts of the skull.
sentences.cn: 婴儿的脑壳有些部分是软骨.

sentences.en: Because in the day, their vertebral gristle can be easily tread down.
sentences.cn: 因为在白天脊椎的软骨组织容易遭到压迫.

sentences.en: Chicken skin and gristle contain a good deal of Chondroitin Sulfate which can nourish the skin.
sentences.cn: 鸡皮和软骨含有大量能够滋养皮肤的硫酸软骨素。

sentences.en: Drinking chicken skin and gristle soup often can also delay the aging of skin.
sentences.cn: 经常喝鸡皮软骨汤能够延缓肌肤衰老。

sentences.en: I can't eat this meat it's all gristle , ie full of gristle.
sentences.cn: 这肉不能吃 -- 净是软骨.

sentences.en: It is defeat that turns bone to flint; it is defeat that turns gristle to muscle; it is defeat that makes men invincible. ----Henry Ward Beecher
sentences.cn: 是挫折使骨头坚如盘石；是挫折使软骨变成肌肉；是挫折使人战无不胜。

trans.tran_en: the part of meat that is not soft enough to eat
